revised_title: Peter Joseph Wilhelm Debye: A Pioneering Physicist and Chemist
tldr: This article provides a detailed biography of Peter Joseph Wilhelm Debye, a renowned physicist and chemist. Born in Maastricht, Debye made significant contributions to the fields of physics and chemistry, including his work on X-ray diffraction and the Debye-Hückel theory. The article highlights his early life, education, and career, as well as his personal life and interests.
